compile.desc: compiles programm by invoking 'make compile' and succeeds iff 0 is returned

binarysize.desc: returns size of everthing under /bin in bytes

correctness.desc: runs by running the challange code with 'make challange-correctness' and the participant code with 'make participant-correctness', succeeds iff the first returns 0

benchmark.desc: measures times needed to complete 'make participant-benchmark'
